meanings.definition: A small terrestrial crustacean with a segmented body that rolls itself into a ball when disturbed.
meanings.sent1: I found a pillbug under the rock in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The pillbug curled into a ball when I touched it.
meanings.sent3: The pillbug decided to play hide-and-seek by rolling into a tiny ball.
meanings.sent4: The pillbug's ability to transform into a sphere amazed the curious child.
meanings.sent5: The pillbug's defensive mechanism of rolling up is like a tiny armored tank.
